entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
